about_the_game:
Nine in Flight is an absurdist mystery for only the most hard-boiled interim junior detectives.

There are no freebies—no “click here to cast suspicion”. The player has nothing but their intuition (and a unique corroboration mechanic) to catch lies, solve puzzles, and unravel a cartoonish murder.


THE RUNDOWN

Adventure the accommodations of history’s never-landingest luxury airship on its maiden voyage.


With branching, interwoven dialogue, learn more than anyone could ever want to know about the types of people who would go on a cruise.


Take things that aren’t yours. They belong to the law now. If you’re lucky, they’re clues.


Carefully corroborate claims and alibis. Catch suspects lying and totally embarrass them about it—to jail.


Test your mental fortitude with challenging puzzles. Regret putting “detail-oriented” on your résumé.


Stylized animated cutscenes deliver shocking revelations. You’ll have more goosebumps than skin.


THE MYSTERY
Hand-picked guests enjoy the maiden voyage of the world’s first ever flying cruise—the brainchild of trillionaire Billiam Pocketsworth.

Deep in the final night, Bill is brutally killed to death, left like a human knife block on the floor of the restaurant kitchen.

With just one day left before landfall, can the Marshal crack the case with nothing but his savvy, wits, and period-appropriate moustache?

content_descriptors.notes: Nine in Flight features some crude language throughout, insinuated consumption of alcohol, and a single cartoon depiction of murder.

name: Nine in Flight

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: An absurdist mystery for only the most hard-boiled interim junior detectives.
